name: Ext_R5_MedicationDispense_pe_actor
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationDispense.performer.actor for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationDispense.performer.actor from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationDispense|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The device, practitioner, etc. who performed the action.  It should be assumed that the actor is the dispenser of the medication.
element.comment: `MedicationDispense.performer.actor` maps to R4B `MedicationDispense.performer.actor`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CareTeam)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The device, practitioner, etc. who performed the action.  It should be assumed that the actor is the dispenser of the medication.
